name: Cricket Games
instructions: You must hit a number 3 times before you start scoring. Typically valid numbers are 15-20 and the Bull. If everyone hits a number at least 3 times it is considered closed out and no further points will be received. To win close all numbers on the board and have the highest score. If the round limit is hit the person with the highest score wins.

Closeout.name: Closeout Cricket
Closeout.instructions: Same as normal cricket but points are only given for closing out your numbers. Each close out is worth 1 point. First person to close all their numbers wins. If the round limit is hit the person with the highest score wins.

Random.name: Random Cricket
Random.instructions: Same as normal cricket but numbers are randomized.

Hidden.name: Hidden Cricket
Hidden.instructions: Same as normal cricket but the numbers are hidden until you reveal them by exploring the board. Discovering numbers is worth bonus points. The first number discovered gives 10 bonus points, second gives 20, third gives 30 and so on.
